description:
'''Post-noise''' is a music genre and scene closely associated with contemporary [[hypnagogic pop]], [[New-age music|new-age]], and [[Hauntology (music)|hauntology]] movements. Artists include [[James Ferraro]] and Spencer Clark of [[The Skaters (band)|The Skaters]], [[Oneohtrix Point Never]], [[Pocahaunted]], [[Zola Jesus]], and [[Emeralds (band)|Emeralds]].

The American post-noise underground mostly propagated on the [[Internet]], primarily through [[tape trading]].
